subject: [EVP-ITC] Did ya miss me!?
author: Rhonda W
full_text:
--0-1292115111-1219336719=:86674
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Im bacccccccck!
=A0
Sorry had dead modem and had to wait for cable company =
to bring out a new one, took em 3 weeks!
=A0
So I did a some sessions while=
 I waited, got some good responses and actually a few EVPs saying my name a=
nd that mom loves you....checked my mail when I got my net back and got an =
email from the lady(Pat) that lived next door to my mom and whom was a good=
 friend of my mom.=A0 Theres a new family living on my moms property now, n=
ew mobile home and all...well they have a 3 year old son who talked to my m=
oms friend a week or so ago...the little boy was telling her about talking =
to a "man with ugly eyes" in his room and how he was nice, he wasnt mean, P=
at thinks(and I tend to agree)=A0that the boy was talking to my mom...my mo=
m had realllllly short hair and didnt have pretty eyes, she had almost manl=
y features as she got older and it would be easy for a 3 year old to think =
she was male, specially at night in a semi dark room.=A0 The boy didnt say =
what they talked about, but they had a conversation and he wasnt scared...t=
his happened on the day I got the EVPs in
 my session.=A0 I wanna get a dig=
i recorder now and see if they would allow me to do a session at their plac=
e...would be very interesting to see what kind of responses Id get if I wer=
e on her property compared to sitting in my place which is 20 miles or so a=
way.
=A0
Anyways, just wanted to share that with ya'll.=A0 Hope everyone is=
 having a good week so far!=A0 
=A0
Rhonda

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Im bacccccccck!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Sorry had dead modem and had to wait for cable company to bring out a new one, took em 3 weeks!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>So I did a some sessions while I waited, got some good responses and actually a few EVPs saying my name and that mom loves you....checked my mail when I got my net back and got an email from the lady(Pat) that lived next door to my mom and whom was a good friend of my mom.  Theres a new family living on my moms property now, new mobile home and all...well they have a 3 year old son who talked to my moms friend a week or so ago...the little boy was telling her about talking to a "man with ugly eyes" in his room and how he was nice, he wasnt mean, Pat thinks(and I tend to agree) that the boy was talking to my mom...my mom had realllllly short hair and didnt have pretty eyes, she had almost manly features as she got older and it would be easy for a 3 year old to think she was male, specially at night in a semi dark room.  The boy didnt say what they talked about, but they had a conversation and he wasnt scared...this happened on the day
 I got the EVPs in my session.  I wanna get a digi recorder now and see if they would allow me to do a session at their place...would be very interesting to see what kind of responses Id get if I were on her property compared to sitting in my place which is 20 miles or so away.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Anyways, just wanted to share that with ya'll.  Hope everyone is having a good week so far!  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Rhonda</DIV></td></tr></table><br>
